Service that makes an element apply theming related classes to itself.

app.directive('myFancyDirective', function($mdTheming) {
  return {
    restrict: 'e',
    link: function(scope, el, attrs) {
      $mdTheming(el);
    }
  };
});

Usage

$mdTheming([element]);

Arguments

Parameter
Type
Description
element el
(optional)
el

to apply theming to
